metadata.title: NBPCLCD 15.6" FHD 1080P IPS LCD Display Touch Screen Digitizer Assembly + Bezel + Touch Control Board Replacement 856793-001 for HP Envy X360 M6-AR000 M6-AR004DX
features: Screen Type:LED LCD Display Touch Screen Digitizer Assembly with bezel

No instruction or tools.Each item has been tested before shipping.
description: Before buying,please carefully review the product image and description,make sure this item is compatitive with your device,if not or you cannot find what you want, please contact us feel free via Amazon.

*Screen Size:15.6 inch*Max. Resolution: 1920x1080*Part Number:856793-001*Compatible For HP Envy X360 M6-AR000 M6-AR004DX *Dead Pixel Policy: LCD Screens are manufactured under ISO 13406-2 and ISO 9241 Class 1 standards, meaning 1 to 5 dead pixels are not considered defective unless they have multiple pixel issues.

*This item is LCD Touch Screen Assembly+Bezel,please verify all connectors and specifications carefully.*Please be careful to take the screen out of the box.This product should be very careful when installation, we are not responsible for the damage in the process of installation,thank you for your understand.*Before installing, Please unplug the power and remove the battery , then install the screen, otherwise the touch will not be able to use or black screen.
